title: Order champions in champ select by lane/role?
body:
Future implementation for sorting champions by lane/role in champ select? good idea?  Seems a little outdated as it stands
-my2cents

replies.body: Fun Fact: You can use the search bar in champ select to find champions of a specific role. Want a tank? Search "tank". Want a support? Search "support".

To further damn people to the current meta?


No thanks.

Or when the Hud Update comes out they could make it possible to do in game.

You know like they are doing.
true^ (ps sorry i read wrong the first time) ://
